entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: 6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: SW 39 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers becoming mixed with flurries this morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon then light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
